nodes.id: 废除干部领导职务终身制

zh-cn: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国在1980年代开始推行的一项重要政治制度改革，旨在终结领导干部职务终身制，建立任期制和退休制度。
description.en: An important political system reform initiated by the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China in the 1980s, aimed at ending the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres and establishing term limits and retirement systems.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物，改革开放的总设计师。他主导并推动了废除干部领导职务终身制。
description.en: The core figure of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of the Reform and Opening-up. He led and promoted the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres.

en: Lifelong tenure system for leading cadres

description.zh-cn: 一种政治制度，指党和国家领导干部除非逝世、退休或被罢免，其职务任期没有限制。该制度在毛泽东时代普遍存在。
description.en: A political system where the tenure of party and state leading cadres is not limited, unless they pass away, retire, or are removed from office. This system was prevalent during the Mao Zedong era.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。其执政时期普遍实行领导干部职务终身制。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. During his rule, the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres was widely practiced.

description.zh-cn: 对公职人员的任职期限进行限制的制度。
description.en: A system that limits the term of office for public officials.

description.zh-cn: 关于公职人员达到一定年龄或服务年限后退出工作岗位的制度安排。
description.en: Institutional arrangements for public officials to withdraw from their work positions after reaching a certain age or length of service.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, who supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席，以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, former President of the People's Republic of China, who supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, who supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, who supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，以实际退休行动支持废除领导职务终身制。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the CPC, who supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading positions through his own retirement.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第五代中央领导集体的核心人物，现任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。其任内通过宪法修正案取消了国家主席的任期限制。
description.en: The core figure of the fifth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, currently serving as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. During his tenure, a constitutional amendment was passed to remove the term limit for the presidency.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
en: 2018 constitutional amendment to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 该修正案取消了《中华人民共和国宪法》中关于国家主席和副主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的规定。
description.en: This amendment removed the provision from the Constitution of the People's Republic of China that the President and Vice President 'shall serve no more than two consecutive terms'.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
十三届全国人大一次会议

description.zh-cn: 于2018年3月召开的会议，会议通过了《中华人民共和国宪法修正案》。
description.en: A meeting held in March 2018, which passed the Constitutional Amendment.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第四代中央领导集体的核心人物。他在2012年卸任所有党政军职务实现“裸退”，被认为是完善废除干部领导职务终身制的表现。
description.en: The core figure of the fourth generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. He implemented a 'naked retirement' in 2012 by relinquishing all party, government, and military positions, which was seen as a move to perfect the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for cadres.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记，是改革开放早期的重要领导人，支持废除干部终身制。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and an important leader during the early stages of Reform and Opening-up, who supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for cadres.

en: On the Reform of the Party and State Leadership System

description.zh-cn: 邓小平于1980年8月18日发表的讲话，提出了对官僚主义、权力过分集中、干部领导职务终身制等弊端进行改革，开启了1980年代的政治体制改革。
description.en: A speech delivered by Deng Xiaoping on August 18, 1980, which proposed reforms to address issues such as bureaucracy, over-concentration of power, and the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres, initiating the political system reform of the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 始于1980年代中国的旨在改革政治结构和制度的运动。
description.en: A movement that began in the 1980s in China aimed at reforming the political structure and system.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会
en: Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中共在1982年至1992年间设立的过渡性机构，旨在安置年事已高的中央领导干部，以推动废除领导干部职务终身制。
description.en: A transitional body established by the CPC from 1982 to 1992 to accommodate senior central leading cadres, in order to promote the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会
en: 12th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 会议通过决议，建立了中国共产党中央顾问委员会。
description.en: The congress passed a resolution to establish the Central Advisory Commission of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
en: 1982 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第四部宪法，也被称为“八二宪法”。它规定了国家主席等领导职务的任期制，正式从法律上废除了领导干部职务终身制。
description.en: The fourth constitution of the People's Republic of China, also known as the '82 Constitution'. It stipulated term limits for leading positions such as the President, formally abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres in law.

nodes.id: 第五届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 其第五次会议于1982年12月通过了《八二宪法》。
description.en: Its fifth session passed the '82 Constitution' in December 1982.

description.zh-cn: 以江泽民为核心的中国共产党领导层，成员包括李鹏、乔石、朱镕基、李瑞环等。
description.en: The leadership of the Communist Party of China with Jiang Zemin at its core, including members like Li Peng, Qiao Shi, Zhu Rongji, and Li Ruihuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第三代中央领导集体的核心人物，主政期间延续了废除干部领导职务终身制的政策。
description.en: The core figure of the third generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China. During his time in power, he continued the policy of abolishing the lifelong tenure system for cadres.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会
en: 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 此次会议上，胡锦涛将中共中央总书记和中央军委主席的职务移交给习近平。
description.en: At this congress, Hu Jintao handed over the positions of General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the Central Military Commission to Xi Jinping.

relationships.target: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在1980年代实际主导最高决策，决定并推动了废除干部领导职务终身制这项重要的政治制度改革。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping, as the paramount leader in the 1980s, decided on and promoted the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres, an important political system reform.

relationships.source: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 该项改革旨在终结并废除在毛泽东时代普遍存在的干部领导职务终身制。
description.en: This reform aimed to end and abolish the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres that was prevalent during the Mao Zedong era.

relationships.source: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 废除干部领导职务终身制改革的重要内容之一是建立起领导干部的任期制。
description.en: A key component of the reform to abolish the lifelong tenure system was the establishment of a term limit system for leading cadres.

relationships.source: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 废除干部领导职务终身制改革的重要内容之一是建立起领导干部的退休制度。
description.en: A key component of the reform to abolish the lifelong tenure system was the establishment of a retirement system for leading cadres.

description.zh-cn: 干部领导职务终身制在毛泽东时代普遍存在并得以确立。
description.en: The lifelong tenure system for leading cadres was widely practiced and established during the Mao Zedong era.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平发表的《党和国家领导制度的改革》讲话，提出了对干部领导职务终身制等弊端进行改革，成为1980年代中国政治体制改革的开端。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping's speech 'On the Reform of the Party and State Leadership System' proposed reforms to address issues like the lifelong tenure system, marking the beginning of China's political system reform in the 1980s.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共十二大通过决议，决定建立中央顾问委员会作为废除领导干部职务终身制的过渡性机构。
description.en: The 12th CPC National Congress passed a resolution to establish the Central Advisory Commission as a transitional body for abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会
relationships.target: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 中央顾问委员会作为一项过渡性制度安排，通过安置老干部，为废除领导职务终身制铺平了道路。
description.en: As a transitional institutional arrangement, the Central Advisory Commission paved the way for the abolition of the lifelong tenure system by accommodating veteran cadres.

relationships.source: 第五届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

description.zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会第五次会议于1982年12月通过了现行宪法（八二宪法）。
description.en: The Fifth Session of the 5th National People's Congress passed the current constitution (the '82 Constitution) in December 1982.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
relationships.target: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 《八二宪法》规定国家主席等领导人“连续任职不得超过两届”，象征着领导干部职务终身制被正式废除。
description.en: The '82 Constitution stipulated that leaders such as the President 'shall serve no more than two consecutive terms,' symbolizing the formal abolition of the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平与其它中共元老卸任领导职务，将权力移交给以江泽民为核心的第三代中央领导集体。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping and other CPC elders stepped down from their leadership positions, transferring power to the third generation of central leadership with Jiang Zemin at its core.

relationships.target: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在中共十八大上卸任所有职务，实现“裸退”，被习近平称赞为“高风亮节”，此举被视为进一步完善了废除干部领导职务终身制的制度。
description.en: Hu Jintao stepped down from all positions at the 18th CPC National Congress, achieving a 'naked retirement,' which was praised by Xi Jinping as a 'noble act' and seen as a further step in perfecting the system of abolishing lifelong tenure for cadres.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

position.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记、中共中央军委主席
position.en: General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在中共十八大上，习近平接替胡锦涛，成为中国共产党的主要领导人。
description.en: At the 18th CPC National Congress, Xi Jinping succeeded Hu Jintao to become the primary leader of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

description.zh-cn: 十三届全国人大一次会议通过了《中华人民共和国宪法修正案》，取消了国家主席的任期限制。
description.en: The first session of the 13th National People's Congress passed the 2018 Constitutional Amendment, removing the term limit for the President.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

description.zh-cn: 取消国家主席任期限制的修宪被普遍认为是习近平为了谋求长期执政而推动的举动。
description.en: The constitutional amendment to remove the presidential term limit is widely seen as a move pushed by Xi Jinping to secure long-term rule.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
relationships.target: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 该修正案取消了国家主席的任期限制，此举被外界解读为对邓小平时代确立的废除领导干部职务终身制原则的逆转，有媒体认为干部领导职务终身制已经复辟。
description.en: This amendment removed the term limit for the President, a move interpreted by outsiders as a reversal of the principle of abolishing lifelong tenure established during the Deng Xiaoping era, with some media suggesting the lifelong system has been restored.

relationships.target: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记胡耀邦支持废除干部终身制。
description.en: Former CPC General Secretary Hu Yaobang supported the abolition of the lifelong tenure system for cadres.

relationships.target: 废除干部领导职务终身制

description.zh-cn: 江泽民在主政期间延续了废除干部领导职务终身制的政策。
description.en: During his tenure, Jiang Zemin continued the policy of abolishing the lifelong tenure system for leading cadres.
